mapper.select: SELECT '' as BOARD_ID ,'전체' as BOARD_NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT BOARD_ID , BOARD_NAME FROM BOARDS WHERE BOARD_ID IN('1','2')
SELECT B.POST_ID ,B.SORT_NUMBER , A.BOARD_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.MEMBER_ID , B.INPUT_DT FROM BOARDS A INNER JOIN POSTS B ON A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE A.BOARD_ID = 1;
SELECT B.POST_ID, B.MEMBER_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.INPUT_DT, A.BOARD_NAME FROM BOARDS A INNER JOIN POSTS B ON A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE B.POST_ID = #{POST_ID}
